text: Hammett is a 1982 American mystery movie directed by Wim Wenders and was based on the novel of the same name by Joe Gores. It stars Peter Boyle, Frederic Forrest, Marilu Henner, Roy Kinnear, David Patrick Kelly, Elisha Cook, Jr., Samuel Fuller, Sylvia Sidney and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 mystery movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Wim Wenders Category:Movies about writers
title: Hammett (movie)
